title: A Life on the farm

abstract: "I wanted to be a pilot but was told I didn't have the right education to fly."
description: Oz Sanderson grew up on his farm with his two brothers during the Great Depression. His dad signed a consent form for him to join the army. While Oz was determined to serve as a pilot, the farm was always in his heart and he was more than happy to return to it after the war ended.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
